ygData.subject: RE: Trade In
ygData.msgSnippet: I been auctioning one for the past 2 nights on Innoruuk - looking for 800pp (will take less) or owner wanted a trade for a Staff of Writhing and 100p -- so far
ygData.messageBody:
I been auctioning one for the past 2 nights on Innoruuk - looking for 800pp
(will take less) or owner wanted a trade for a Staff of Writhing and 100p
-- so far - no takers - too many steins have been quested me thinks

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: RON_TALBOT@...
[mailto:RON_TALBOT@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 12:32 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Trade In

From: RON_TALBOT@...

OK,

After two days of errand running, escort duty and
chores (my bud
is a 25th level enchanter and she has run the quest
eight times now.)
I am now the proud owner of a glowing stein. Why you
say? Your a
bard silly and you can't even drink out of it...
anyway I hoping to
trade this baby in for something good before the value
drops any more.
(I wish V would disable the quest like the rumors claim
then the value
would skyrocket)
What do you think I can get for a Glowing stein?
Thulian claws?
Writhing staff, Elfhide (shudder) gloves, trollhide
belt? What would
you suggest? Specifically which zone should I go to,
to trade for the
claws? Suggestions and rude comments welcome. :)

Bujold 19th level
Xegony
